[`Workspace`](../Workspace) › [`layoutReady`](./layoutReady)

## Workspace.layoutReady property

If the layout of the app has been successfully initialized. To react to the layout becoming ready, use [Workspace.onLayoutReady()](./onLayoutReady)

**Signature:**

```typescript
layoutReady: boolean;
```
